Html:
Now that I'm hit and maybe haste capped, I finally got around to trying the Optimize and Build Upgrade List functions for my SPriest.

Optimize found a set of gear that made sense to me - it came close to the hit cap and haste plateu, and not over.  Very cool actually - makes me understand more what this project has been all about.  Thanks to all of you who've been making this happen!

When I then tried Build Upgrade List, it did generate a list of items, but the value for all was zero - meaning, the chart just listed item names but none had a bar or value.  The horizontal scale on the chart was from 0.0 to 2.0.  The ordering of the items didn't make any sense I could tell, the items at the top did not seem like they could be the best items available to me since they were wands.

Am I maybe missing a step or not understanding how to use this output?
This is a real bug that I'm still working on figuring out :P
OK, thanks TNSe.  For now I will simply report to my guild that according to Rawr I am maximally geared with no possible upgrades, so they should crown me king and send me tribute ;-)
Haha, that could backfire the day something drops that you'd need :P
